name: skills-of-luca
description: Development workflow skills: devenv tools for reproducible environments, full-stack development, CI/CD optimization, code quality analysis, Neovim configuration, and skill authoring tools. Install bundled plugins for complete workflows or individual skills as needed.

plugins.name: devenv
plugins.description: Complete devenv toolkit: search, initialize, and configure reproducible development environments with full-stack and CI/CD support

plugins.name: code-quality
plugins.description: Code quality analysis: review code for bugs, security issues, performance problems, and best practices

plugins.name: hono
plugins.description: Skills for building web applications with the Hono framework: project setup, middleware, authentication, validation, testing, deployment, databases, JSX rendering, and WebSockets

plugins.name: neovim
plugins.description: Neovim configuration toolkit: generate, modify, troubleshoot configs with lazy.nvim, LazyVim support, LSP setup, and headless testing

plugins.name: issues
plugins.description: Issue management toolkit: create well-structured issues, analyze issues against codebase, and organize issues with proper formatting, labels, and project fields. Supports GitHub, GitLab, and other platforms.

plugins.name: skill-authoring
plugins.description: Skill authoring toolkit: create, validate, and improve Claude Code skills with templates, best practices, and quality checks

plugins.name: pull-requests
plugins.description: Pull request toolkit: create well-structured PRs, review code changes, update PR metadata, and resolve merge conflicts with context-aware guidance

plugins.name: github-actions
plugins.description: GitHub Actions toolkit: initialize CI/CD workflows, debug failing runs, and optimize workflow performance for speed and cost reduction

plugins.name: releases
plugins.description: Release management toolkit: generate release notes from commits and PRs, maintain changelogs, and manage semantic versioning

plugins.name: repo-setup
plugins.description: Repository setup toolkit: initialize repos with best practices, create issue/PR templates, manage CODEOWNERS, and generate contributing guides

plugins.name: security
plugins.description: Security toolkit: configure Dependabot for dependency updates, manage security advisories, and audit repositories for exposed secrets

plugins.name: project-management
plugins.description: Project management toolkit: manage GitHub Projects boards, synchronize repository labels, and track milestone progress
